mapper.sql: SELECT gc.id AS id, gc.sn AS sn, gc.type AS type, gc.status AS status, gc.start_date AS startDate, gc.end_date AS endDate, gc.create_time AS createTime, ( CASE WHEN gcu.user_type = '0' THEN ( SELECT ps.name FROM property.t_property_staff ps WHERE ps.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '1' THEN ( SELECT p.name FROM property.t_proprietor p WHERE p.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '2' THEN ( SELECT r.name FROM property.t_resident r WHERE r.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '3' THEN ( SELECT v.name FROM property.t_visitor v WHERE v.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '4' THEN ( SELECT a.name FROM property.t_attendant a WHERE a.id = gcu.user_id ) END ) AS userName, ( CASE WHEN gcu.user_type = '0' THEN ( SELECT ps.name FROM property.t_property_staff ps LEFT JOIN property.t_staff_archive sa ON sa.staff_id = ps.id WHERE ps.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '1' THEN ( SELECT p.phone FROM property.t_proprietor p WHERE p.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '2' THEN ( SELECT r.mobile FROM property.t_resident r WHERE r.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '3' THEN ( SELECT v.phone FROM property.t_visitor v WHERE v.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '4' THEN ( SELECT a.phone FROM property.t_attendant a WHERE a.id = gcu.user_id ) END ) AS mobile, gc.project_id AS projectId, pr.full_name AS projectName, gc.oem_code AS oemCode, gcu.user_type AS userType, gcu.user_id AS userId, prs.name AS staffName FROM property.t_guard_card gc LEFT JOIN property.t_guard_card_user gcu ON gcu.card_id = gc.id LEFT JOIN property.t_property_staff prs ON prs.id = gcu.staff_id LEFT JOIN property.t_project pr ON pr.id = gc.project_id
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM () AS cv WHERE cv.id = #{guardCardId}
